properties.text:
Welcome to the manual your probably most exited about to read... The Art of Weapons Manual!!

In this manual you will see all the crafting recipes from the guns the bullets and their attachments that you wont be able to find in your JEI menu!

I wish you the best of luck at killing!

Weapon Tutorial:

Attachment mode - Press 'M' to enter attachment mode. To add attachments, you must have the attachments in your inventory. Further instructions will be displayed on screen of your game. Press the 'UP' arrow key to change sights/scopes. Press the 'DOWN' arrow key to add grips/laser attachments (press L to toggle laser on/off when equipped). Press the 'LEFT' arrow key to add a silencer that fits the gun's caliber (displayed under gun in inventory). And press the 'RIGHT' arrow key to change the gun skin. Keep in mind that not every gun takes the same skins.

Ammunition - Press 'R' to load the gun with the proper magazine in your inventory. Press 'R' to unload a magazine currently loaded into the gun. To refill a magazine, hold it in your hand and press 'R' with the correct rounds (bullets) in your inventory. Each magazine name will display the amount of ammo it holds first, then the type of bullet it requires.

Grenades - It's relatively simple. Left click to throw far, and right click to throw close.
'/mw s a' this command allows you to view which attachments are compatible with the firearm held in your hand.
